product_name: SunCloud Cookie Polarized Sunglasses - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With bright colors, a bold shape and protective, polarized lenses, the SunCloud Cookie Polarized Sunglasses are the perfect combination of fashion and function. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection-molded polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact-resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact-resistant. Paisley frames feature rose polarized lenses; sea blue laser frames feature gray polarized lenses. SunCloud Cookie polarized sunglasses include a microfiber storage bag. Closeout.
short_description: With bright colors, a bold shape and protective, polarized lenses, the SunCloud Cookie Polarized Sunglasses are the perfect combination of fashion and function.
